----

== Object Model ==

Mind primary layers:

  * mind target
{{{
   * class MindActuator : MindRegion
   * class MindSensor : MindActuator
   * class MindEffector : MindActuator
}}}
  * mind service
{{{
   * class MindService : Service
MindAreaSet areas;
MindLinkSet links;    
}}}
  * mind area
{{{
   * class MindArea
   * class MindRegionSet
   * class MindRegionLinkSet
}}}
  * mind region
{{{
   * class MindRegion
   * class NeuroLinkSet
}}}
  * mind matter
{{{
   * class NeuroSet
   * class NeuroNet
   * class NeuroLink
}}}

Mind auxiliary objects:

  * mind stream
{{{
   * class MindLink : MessageSubscriber
   * class RegionLink
   * class MindMessage : BinaryMessage
}}}
  * mind space
{{{
   * class MindLocation
   * class MindMap
   * class MindAreaInfo
   * class MindLinkInfo
}}}
  * mind base
{{{
   * (low-level data types)
}}}
